projectPurpose: To serve as the core display server and window manager (compositor) specifically for the COSMIC desktop environment, responsible for rendering windows, handling window placement, managing workspaces, and providing visual effects using the Wayland protocol.
mainFeatures: Compositor for the COSMIC desktop environment
Integrates with COSMIC desktop environment components (greeter, session)
Handles window management and compositing for the COSMIC DE

marketPositioning: Cosmic-comp is positioned as the native and tightly integrated compositor for the new, Rust-based COSMIC desktop environment by System76. Unlike established compositors like Mutter and KWin which serve major desktop environments and often support both X11 and Wayland, cosmic-comp is exclusively focused on Wayland and the specific design philosophy of COSMIC. It is part of a ground-up effort to build a modern, performant, and cohesive desktop experience, differentiating itself from standalone compositors or those designed for broader compatibility across different desktop environments. Its development in Rust is a key aspect of its identity within the COSMIC ecosystem.
